data.name: Action Ball
data.detailed_description:
Free the Earth from invaders from Robot Empire by driving a mobile paddle-equipped ship. Be careful and agile - while you are destroying enemy fortresses, the invaders will try to stop you in every way. Dodge the attacks of the Guards and don't let the Repairmen restore the defenses!

Destroy everything you see on the screen by making your ball a terminator that does not feel obstacles. Or fill it with explosives and launch it into a crowd of enemies - all means are good in war!

You are waiting for heavy battles with generals, who have at their disposal the full power of Robot Empire military technologies. Machine guns, flamethrowers, cannons, rockets - use all available weapons to free the Earth from invaders!

Features

  • 260+ fascinating levels
  • 3 difficulty modes
  • 10 types of bricks
  • 6 kinds of robots and 3 kinds of bosses
  • 28 sorts of bonuses
  • bright, colorful 3D-graphics
  • extra dynamic gameplay

data.short_description: Meet the good old 3D Breakout style game straight out of the 2000s! No open world, no lootboxes, no towers and no NFT. Just you, the ball and bricks. Fun in direct and concentrated form! And by the way, do you want a machine gun or flamethrower? Or both at once?
